name: Valli Funk
text: Delicious handmade pizza! We got the 3 topping medium pizza and an appetizer of cheese and pesto garlic bread. The app was about $5 and a big, shareable portion! Very delicious. The place has a 60's hippie vibe from the wall decor to the paper straws. Service is good as well. I will be back!

name: nikki kennedy
text: Really enjoyed our visit! Our server, Selina, was awesome and really made our meal amazing! We had a large pizza and a lovely dessert, and my dad and I tried a couple drinks.  All of it was really good. Hopefully we can visit the next time we're in town!

name: Jenna Guerrero
text: We took our entire baseball team here for an end of season dinner. Even though were literally took up the entire 2nd floor the service was excellent.  Our food came out quickly and our drinks stayed topped off. The food was delicious as usual.

name: Madeleine
text: Great, casual option for pizza and salads. We had a build your own salad and a bbq chicken pizza, both of which were tasty. The salads are huge and you definitely get your money's worth. I love how customizable each item on the menu is.

name: Slade Neeley
text: Can't say enough positive things about the visit. The food, the reason we go, is fresh tasting, homemade and absolutely delicious. To go along with the food the mixed cocktails would be enough to bring me and the Mrs. back. Michael who made …More

name: Greg Jordan-Detamore
text: Excellent quality pizza! I really wanted to finish the whole thing in the restaurant but sadly had to get some to go because I was full. My server, Lyndsey, was great. I would definitely return!

name: Lily Weiner
text:
There’s a chance that I ate here twice in two days and I did not regret it at all?)?? They have a DOPE vegan cheese and like
The crust is malleable and good...:: this starts my campaign to bring Mellow mushroom to Cali please someone buy a franchise and help a girl out

name: Eldon Ladner
text: The place wasn't too crowded, but had quite a few people there. The place is nice and clean. The employees were friendly. The food was good. The prices are medium to high. Example; My son ordered a 10" pizza with 5 toppings. It comes with 2 …More

name: Evan Christensen
text: Pizza is always amazing! Love the crust, not too thick and not too thin. We still wish they had the Metairie location for convenience but we still make the trek uptown for the great food.

name: Leslie Detillieu
text: Today, I looked forward to eating Mellow Mushroom all day. I got to the store and I didn’t even get greeted when i walked in. I was told my To-go order wasn’t ready so I went to wait at the bar to have a beer but the entire bar was full. We …More

name: Meredith Stalker
text: Excellent beer, service and food! The artwork on the menu and the walls was amazing.

name: Joseph
text: The food was simply not good here. I have given this place two chances. The first time I got the spinach and artichoke dip which tasted like it was a few days old. The garlic toast that it came with was good though. On my second visit I got …More

name: Antonio Magana
text: Place was cool. Pizza tastes good. But was kinda too crispy. Still tasted good. Feel like location could have nicer staff or make customers feel more welcomed. Didnt feel as if they wanted my money.

name: Tom Schmidt
text: Tried delivery first (a winner on pizza) so I came to check the joint out in person. Calzone was even better. The outside is basted with garlicy butter and Parmesan. Delicious.

name: Donna Boudloche Prosperie
text: Food is excellent, our waitress was the best!!

name: Stephen LaGuardia
text: Delicious pizza, casual environment, family friendly restaurant in oak St. Don't forget the unique appetizer menu.

name: Gina MacLaren Realtor
text: Good food and service. The place is decorated very cute. We started with the spinach artichoke dip - delicious, Greek salad, California club hoagie, and a pepperoni pizza. The hoagie was just ok but everything else was great. Especially the dip.... YUM!

name: Tamela Ritter
text: Never did I imagine that a bowl of mushroom soup would be a religious experience, but I'd never had their soup before. I am transformed.

name: S M
text:
Great staff, nice folks, and food.
The wings were the best I have had in the city. Done perfect. Not too much fat or skin lot of meat, mix of drums and legs and the best jerk sauce I have had …More

name: Jacob Walker
text:
Excellent pizza packed with flavor and quality ingredients.
However you need to staff more waiters. Place was packed, and one girl had to handle the whole place by herself. I had to wait at least 30 minutes for my check, …More

name: Tracy Meyer
text: Very friendly staff and super tasty pizza 😋 Love the atmosphere as well. Very fun and casual.

name: Danielle Levitt
text: The crusts on these pizzas are crisp on the outside and soft on the inside, the pizza flavors just melt together (Funky Q Chicken with red sauce is my favorite), the meatball appetizer tasted like mozzarella sticks and spaghetti with …More

name: Imdad Haque
text: Pretzels and beer cheese are yummy but the cheese sauce could be more rich and less beer-y. Happy hour prices are phenomenal, and the atmosphere is extremely vibrant and nice.

name: AVA SCHUBERT
text: Amazing service and delicious food!

name: Alan Berg
text: Great food and bar. Good spot for vegan friendly food!

name: Amy
text: Liked the pizza and the salad but their idea of a thin crust is no where near mine.

name: Roschelle Rumley
text: Great-great and I do mean great customer service. The pizza was amazingly delicious.

name: jody eastman
text: The best pizza I have ever had. I usually prefer thin crust but this was spectacular.... Coupled with a good craft beer selection makes this place great!

name: elan tran
text: great service, great 420 mango kush beer, just great everything!

name: joel williams
text: I would say if your a vegan you probably shouldn’t go here. All except for once did they mess up my order. Twice the food wasn’t cooked all the way. Another couple time they put butter on it and once non vegan Parmesan cheese. …More

name: Teri Hodgson
text: Great food and amazing service! You'd be a fool to miss this place!

name: ghostly pancake
text: Environment was spectacular. I love the bar, the fun theme, and so on. However the food could have been better. We ordered a pizza from there, and just have to say, for the price? Not worth it. The crust was a bit rough and the flavor …More

name: Samuel Roberts
text: Awesome place. We had pizza that was superb and enjoyed a few beers. Service was great. Unique decor that we really enjoyed. This is worth a visit. Inexpensive and delicious. Well done.

name: Robert Leith Sr
text:
Loved the place. Parking is a challenge. But worth the effort.
Greatly appreciated

name: Mark S
text: Great pizza, great service! Highly recommended.

name: Azurien Bellatrix
text: Love those calzones and salad.  Neat looking place.  Any form of Italian/ pizza in New Orleans that's good is hard to find! Yummers!

name: olivia spence
text: Any of their pizzas can be made on a gluten free crust.  The menu is clearly marked which toppings are gluten free and which are not.  Not my favorite GF crust but it's ok and everyone else loved their food.

name: Christopher Johnston
text: Great service, good prices, and at about 2:00 in the afternoon on a weekday it's completely dead.

name: Peter Brady
text: Service was good, but the worst cheesesteak sandwich I've had in years.  Super dry and waaaaay to much black pepper.  Worst cheesesteak sandwich in the neighborhood, hands down. …More

name: Joost Morsink
text: Good pizza place, decent beer selection, great atmosphere. I'm picky about pizza but this definitely does the trick if you would like some good food on your way to a bar/party.

name: Jaelene Cumba
text: Quirky pizza place. You can play Mario Kart at the second floor. Bar available on both levels.

name: Jason Sperry
text: It's fine just nothing special or interesting about it.

name: Donna Kennedy
text: Excellent pizza reasonable price gracious staff

name: Bradley Love
text: You get what you pay for I suppose. And I paid for a burger at a pizza place. But it gets better.....I ordered my burger medium rare, dressed with roasted potatoes and the burger came with bacon and cheese with no condiments, vegetables and …More

name: doug brown
text: They were out of several things we tried to order, what we had was good, but the place isn't very lively

name: Alexander Malsbury
text: Shared a calzone with my main squeeze and it was the perfect size for the 2 of us. The leftovers were delicious too!

name: Kent Goode
text: Quality food, great malted beveridge selection, good atmosphere

name: Andrea F
text: Street parking only. Good pizza, decent service.

name: K V
text: Friendly staff. My respect for treating me like a customer even if I just bought one slice. Some places and waiters only see customers as $ or $$ signs and treat them accordingly. You do a better job. Next time I'm coming here I'm gonna get wasted and spend more money. I promise.

name: Patricia Shelton
text: The food is good! Service too!

name: Sean Griffin
text: Food was good but service was below average since it wasn't busy

name: Ed Purcell
text: About the best mushroom pizza I have ever had

name: Caitlin Fitzgerald
text: As someone constantly looking for good gluten free options, this place is great. They usually have a gluten free beer by the bottle and work hard to make sure their gluten free pizzas are safely cooked separately from other food. Wait staff is pretty friendly and the atmosphere is laid back.

name: Margaret Marley
text: Good food. Bad service and weak drinks.  Get carry out

name: Kelby
text: Easily one of the biggest, fullest, best tasting calzones I’ve ever had. Next time I visit NOLA I will be coming back!

name: Thomas Garatie
text: Great food, wonderful atmosphere, awesome board game selection and the owner is incredibly friendly and helpful. Definitely making this place a regular hangout spot. So much fun!!!!

name: Rosalyn Harris
text: Great service great pizza & salads

name: Charlie Dixon
text:
Let me summarize our experience....

1) 5 minutes to get seated for a party of 9, 6 adults and 3 little kids... not …More

name: Nicolas
text: Got a large pepperoni pizza. EXCELLENT! Crust was especially great, but crust is always my persinal favorite. The service was also really good. Will hopefully be back!

name: Nikki Brown
text: Fantastic pizza! Good service, good bloody Mary, comfortable atmosphere, fun decor.

name: Karen LaCorte Lussier
text: The best pizza in Louisiana! Fast and friendly service! Beautiful bar! Lighting is incredible! Priced perfectly to fit anyone's budget. Can't wait to go back!

name: Robyn Cernak
text: Great staff and delicious food! Love the colors and artwork too, The Mellow Mushroom never disappoints.

name: Al Prieto
text: Excellent place for custom Pizza

name: Spirit LoveRoot
text: service is chill vibe. can come off as aloof to some but not me! i prefer this vibe. it's like dinner in a living room with cool lighting and atmosphere. …More

name: Phil Doughty
text: Queso Blanco veganized with Follow Your Heart is a wet dream for one who finds it hard to beat my college days of working at TWO pizza parlors at the same time.

name: Connor Gleason
text: A great selection of pizzas in a warm environment.

name: Kevyn Aguiluz
text: Cool place, nice people, nice service, and good pizza. Highly recommend

name: Hillary Hall
text: I love these guys but sometimes they burn my food and it's a little bit hit or miss for that reason. Great staff tough, the Esperanza salad dressing is THE REALNESS and it's super charming. Mellow in Savannah used to be my go-to so I love having one here.

name: S S
text: Mike is a very great work. Love him will definitely come back

name: Paul Hosler
text: The server was a nice kid, the pbr cheese dip for the pretzel bites was good. The pizza was nasty. I'm a huge pizza fan, the I'd eat the stuff everyday if I could kind of fan. The sauce was nearly flavorless, basically tomato only. The …More

name: georgette pressler
text: What an awesome little gem to find in New Orleans! I love this Mellow Mushroom and all the beautiful artwork by Bryan Cunningham! The staff was super friendly and there's a gorgeous bedazzled mirrored cock on the balcony LOL! You'll see it😉

name: Sean Johnstone
text: The environment of this place is great! Staff is friendly, warm vibes and they have classic games (video and board) that you can play with friends and strangers. Their beer selection is also very good and plentiful. The food is good. My …More

name: Jason Frazier
text: The food was great and the service spectacular.

name: Ronda Steele
text: Good service and good food

name: Miranda Thomason
text: The decor fits the surrounding neighborhood. The hummus plate was tasty.

name: Melissa Kolb
text: The gluten free vegan pizza is delicious. It is nice to be able to go eat with omnivores and have options. Also, the marinated tempeh is on point as a salad topper... Yum!

name: Laura-Lee Ellison
text: Wonderful staff, great menu, and incredible owners. Bunch of fun stuff to do like Salsa dancing classes! This is doing it right in New Orleans!!! Two thumbs up for me and my friends!!!

name: Bruno Giuntini
text: Was expelled by the waitress one hour before closing time. 😢

text: Great small business pizza!

name: Toi Monroe
text: Server did not introduce herself. Came back with drinks & didn't show up for another 10 minutes. Finally came to take our food order (still didn't mention her name). My sister had never been there before so she asked a lot of menu questions …More

name: Lanny Kilchrist
text: Good pizza.

text: Its always a great dining experience. The atmosphere is great as well

name: Brandi Nelson
text: Service was a little slow, but really good food

name: Georgia Wood

name: Geoffrey Gibbons
text: Great pizza. Excellent pretzel bites

name: Because I Care
text: We are from Michigan, we stayed in Houma, LA. We ate here every chance we could. My daughters and grandchildren also rate Mellow Mushroom #1!!!!

name: Jeff Isenman
text: Service was great and the pizza was delicious and cooked just right.

name: Philip Cordis
text: We order out from this place, they have fresh ingredients and the pizza tests great. Solid place to eat. They have a small bar to one side and it looks like it would be a great place to meet friends.

name: Jacob Domingue
text: This is a funky location that has awesome vibes. I love to food and staff. I just wish that the location in Lafayette stayed open

name: Zane Schmidt
text: My girlfriend just ordered a pizza from Mellow off of the Waitr App. Pure disappointment. Ever since they got rid of the last manager Laura, the place has steadily gone downhill. They simply can’t get an order right. We ordered a large …More

name: Toby Acosta
text: Good food.

name: Jessica Haines
text: This location had more of a bar vibe than restaurant.  It was still good, if a little loud.

name: Corey q1 x 9j 5Stevens
text: This was my first time to this Mellow Mushroom location. I had previously been to the one in Metairie on Veterans Boulevard and honestly did not like it. But this Mellow Mushroom I believe is the original Mellow Mushroom the interior Ambiance is great a much smaller scale more personal environment and the pizza was great

text: Spinach artichoke dip was awesome.  The rest not to my taste

text: Best pizza place. We ate here twice during our stay.

text: If you like cold food and you like kids running around and wait staff ignoring you this is the place for you to go. Deplorable

text: Mellow Mushroom is more expensive than Pizza Hut or Domino's, but it has better pizza too.

name: Nat Max
text: Friends loved it. The 3 pizzas we got were Meh. I would not go back for this style of pizza. Crust is yellow and has an strange taste. The crust is not like any pizza I have had before and I will not be going back any time soon. …More

name: James Phelps
text: Vibe is comfortable and good for groups. The price is reasonable, especially when they offer MILITARY DISCOUNT. Great food/drinks, the pizza is phenomenal. Parking is the only issue, but a little walk never hurt anybody.

name: Jimmy A
text: Fantastic pizza! Mellowterarian was delicious!  Service is quick and happy! Music is perfect.  Great beer selection.  This spot rocks.  Definitely worth the trip to Oak street.

name: Eleni Pertuz
text: Awesome service, the mushroom tea they make is great. Food was as good as the atmosphere. Would give more stars if i could.

name: Mike Chicago
text: I didn't know that this was a chain, but after eating at a mellow mushroom in Covington I wanted to try one locally. So we ate in. It's a nice place, friendly people. Clean, nice …More

name: James LeBlanc
text: Good food. Free game box upstairs. Great service.

name: Windy
text: Waitress, salad and pizza were great. The total of 4 toppings, on the large pizza, was definitely lacking quantity (naked pizza). We didn't complain bc we were very hungry.

name: Angie P.
text: One word: hoagie. Oh my gosh it was so good. Their pizza is incredible and the atmosphere is fun and funky!

name: Andrea Hall
text: Very relaxing spot for locals and all! The House pizza is loaded and delicious.....we had a great one on Mother's Day!

name: Tyler Hintz
text: As a NY'er I give mellow my stamp of approval. Great dough and ingredients. Service was great as well. Worth the time.

name: Amy T
text: Service was great, food was delicious. The coconut mellow mojito were so yummy, I had to have two of them. The pretzel app got Everyone talking. Def. swing in and check this joint out.

name: Leslie Buckley
text: The food and drinks are sooo good. Olivia is the best! I sat at the bar and she gave me great suggestions and is very delightful to be around. I live in the neighborhood and I'm thinking that this is my new spot. 😊

name: Paula Keller
text: I always enjoy Mellow Mushroom, especially the House Calzone -- it has spinach, mushrooms, tomatoes, delicious sauce and yummy cheese! They are usually a little slow during lunch but when they do get busy, they don't always have the staff …More
